sections.header: Helping companies build better, scalable software.
sections.paragraph: Award-winnning web developer and author, with over 15+ years of working experience with Fortune 500 companies like Apple, Google, Facebook, and more.
Rethinking the way writers get paid, and opensource platform designed to help writers focus more on writing, and less on when and how, they'll get paid. Project in collaboration with CodeWell.cc
Allowing backpack travelers to perfectly plan their trip through an open-source platform similar to TripAdvisor. With over 1m MAU, YelpCamp ahs been the crowd's favorite in 2021.

sections.header: A co-founder at one of the world's largest communities.
sections.paragraph:
The combined experience I have working at the top Fortune 500 companies has allowed me to developer a skillset that helps me not just development, but in every aspect of any business.

 I'm proud to announce that I am now working at one of the world's largest communities teaching young minds about how to sell yourself as developer and open them to a whole new world of oppurtinites.

 As a Developer, you have everything avalaible to you and all that's holding you back is yourself.

 A quote I live by perfectly illustrates what I mean.

"How big would you dream, if knew you wouldn't fail?" You've already gone through the hardest parts being a developer, it's time to elevate your skills and become a leader in something you're pasionate about. 

I'm happy to chat over coffee some time about how I can help your company.
I'm active on all social media platforms listed below, but can also me an email and I will get back to you within 24-48 hours.
